verses.name: Luke 5:15
verses.text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him: and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.

verses.name: Luke 5:16
verses.text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.

verses.name: Luke 5:17
verses.text: And it came to pass on a certain day, as he was teaching, that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by, which were come out of every town of Galilee, and Judea, and Jerusalem: and the power of the Lord was present to heal them.
